55.heading: DC Comics.
55.title: Showcase Presents Superman. Vol. 1.
55.author: [No author]
notes: "Originally published in single magazine form in Action Comics 241-257 and Superman 122-134."

A collection of Superman comics that were originally published in 1959 through 1963. Includes the introduction of his first love, Lori Lemaris, and the appearance of Supergirl. The Man of Steel faces his most dangerous opponents, including Bizarro, Metallo, and Brainiac.
Cover title: DC Showcase Presents Superman.
